divs: Sighting Detailswent out to cool off and seen this oject flying from the north and going south right over market street in Spokane that street about 800 to a 1000 feet from it was about over two blocks long and and maybe about 75 to 100 feet tall could not tell how wide it mad no sound then was looking at utube for this kind of story lord and behold I found what I saw told my wife that this is what I saw it was dark and it just went for about minut or so and just left to the south just went out of sight and then ran in to tell my wife this not the first time I seen some thing I didn't know what it was when I was 14 I seen one that was hovering only about 4 to 3 foot off the ground me and my cousin witness this we were in Montana coram motana never forget that to that was real small it was the shape of a diamond or like the old game where u push it down it was call top toy is the only way to say what the one look like .
trends: There have been 41 other sightings in Spokane
There were no other sightings in Spokane on or around August 15th 2012
Summary: i got a pic i found on utube
